title: (x) GeorgeWBush.com font - Verdana {Marc O}
content:
I'm working on a site that parodies Bush's. Any chance someone knows the "Yes, America Can!" font on the main banner at [http://www.georgewbush.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20051125094219/http:/www.georgewbush.com/)? It seems to be used throughout the page (in the right sidebar headers, e.g. "BUSH-CHENEY coalitions").   
   
Thanks for any guidance!   
   
\<\< Jonathan
author: jareha

comments.content: The "Yes, America..." font is Verdana Bold. The one used for the subheads on the right is a different font -- Arial Black, I believe.

Oh, that simple? Thanks Marc.   
   
\<\< Jonathan

Simple fonts for a simpleton!   
   
(Referring to the candidate, of course.)
